remarks: Perform a multiply-add of two numerals ` M ` and ` N ` against a fixed multiplicand ` P ` (no carry).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
statement:
decma.1 $e |- A e. NN0 $.
decma.2 $e |- B e. NN0 $.
decma.3 $e |- C e. NN0 $.
decma.4 $e |- D e. NN0 $.
decma.5 $e |- M = ; A B $.
decma.6 $e |- N = ; C D $.
decma.7 $e |- P e. NN0 $.
decma.8 $e |- ( ( A x. P ) + C ) = E $.
decma.9 $e |- ( ( B x. P ) + D ) = F $.
decma $p |- ( ( M x. P ) + N ) = ; E F $.
